title: She Got It On The FIRST Try! - NZXT BLD Kit
tags: I Can't Believe It Worked On the First Try!
Can NZXT Teach Me How To Build A PC?
description: Thanks to NZXT for Sponsoring today's video! Get your NZXT BLD kit today   Building a PC comes to us reasonably quickly at Linus Media Group, but we can't forget that everyone doesn't get the opportunity to make a PC every week. So NZXT created the BLD kit as it guides newcomers and families on how to build a PC for the first time! Hopefully, Sarah doesn't give it the shakes this time.   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
